meta.title: We create web services for millions to use
meta.description: Our specialty is front-end web development outsourcing. We bring logic to the world with JavaScript. And dream of the stars.

imgAlt.dev: picture that represents our CSSSR team
imgAlt.geometry: geometric figures showing the range of our services: a triangle with the text “MVP”, a circle with the text “Support the development of high load web applications” and a square with the text “Stack migration”
imgAlt.time: a woman on a bike with a jet pack, showing how quickly we do our job, with the text “We care about time-to-market metrics”
imgAlt.perfect: a man who neatly and meticulously cuts geometric bonsai, showing our desire to do everything perfectly, with the text “We born with a gene of perfectionism”
imgAlt.letter: a letter — hang-glider on which a man is flying

hire.title: We bring logic to the world with JavaScript
hire.subTitle: and dream of the stars
hire.paragraph1: We write code. Our specialty is front-end development for banks, insurance companies, airlines and mobile network operators.
hire.paragraph2: We don’t just work with big companies — we also help startups that are just beginning their journeys.
hire.author: Dmitriy Chekin, CEO

service.title: We create web services for millions
service.text: First and foremost, we’re engineers. Our calling card is finding top-tier, elegant and economical business solutions. We use a variety of tools, technologies and programming languages — most commonly, JavaScript.
service.app: Development and support of high-load web applications

time.title: Time-to-market is important to us
time.text: Our software development framework is oriented around sprints, and similar to Scrum methodology. Our sprints generally last 1–2 weeks, and at the end of each sprint, we release a new build and plan product features for the next sprint.

competence.text1:
There is no one-size-fits-all framework.
We choose the most appropriate instruments for the task at hand.
competence.text2: We use open-source technologies and frameworks that are free and oriented toward commercial use, because developer participation in the communities makes them more reliable.
competence.text3: We keep up-to-date with the latest market trends and tools.

partners.title: More than 450 completed projects in different industries

clients.title: Over 450 completed projects
clients.text1: We work with large companies for whom a strong online presence is important. We share their business interests and help them achieve their goals.

portfolio.title: Projects
portfolio.text: We love doing projects with intuitive interfaces and good code

perfect.title: Perfectionism is in our DNA
perfect.text: As perfectionists, we like to work through every detail, building elegant, and architecturally complex solutions. We think that details are what make the difference between just okay projects, and <nobr>market-changing</nobr> solutions. But perfection can be even more dangerous than procrastination at times, which is why we’ve tamed our near maniacal attention to detail to focus on our clients' business requirements.
